status_legend.0: Normal Operation - The turbine is in normal power production mode
status_legend.1: Derated Operation - Derated power generation with a power restriction
status_legend.2: Idling - Asset is idling and waits to operate again
status_legend.3: Service - Asset is in service mode / service team is at the site
status_legend.4: Downtime - Asset is down due a fault or other reasons

summary: Across the 6‑hour window the turbine stayed in Normal Operation for all 37 ten‑minute intervals, producing near-rated power (mean 0.9726) with very low variability (power_std 0.0059) under generally strong winds (wind_speed_mean 14.96, std 0.82), with at least one brief extreme wind event (wind_speed_max 28.1; high_wind tag). Operational variability was low overall (rotor_rpm_std 0.0315; generator_rpm_std 1.0482) with steady average pitch (9.53) and a persistent nonzero yaw misalignment (mean 8.93). Notable anomalies/patterns include a consistently negative power residual (mean −0.0836) and elevated temperatures (temp_mean 65.23; elevated_temps tag).
